      • printCell

        private java.lang.String printCell​(int x,
                                   int y,
                                   int row,
                                   java.util.List<Player> marked,
                                   java.util.List<Point> highlighted)
        Cell display formatter to print out a map cell
        Parameters:
        x - Cell X coordinate
        y - Cell Y coordinate
        row - Row number of the cell (between 0 and 8) depending on the row the map is printing out
        marked - Players to be highlighted
        highlighted - Cells to be highlighted
        Returns:
        Cell part formatted string

      • corner

        private java.lang.String corner​(int x,
                                int y,
                                boolean north,
                                boolean west)
        Cell corner formatter
        Parameters:
        x - Cell x coordinate
        y - Cell y coordinate
        north - If true considers the northern part of the cell, the south one otherwise
        west - If true considers the west part of the cell, the east one otherwise
        Returns:
        Formatted corner string
